summary: This is an automated out-of-office email reply from an individual at USAFLS (likely U.S. Air Force Legal Services) to attorney Robert C. Josefsberg, sent on December 29, 2008. The email indicates the sender will be out of the office from December 22, 2008, to January 3, 2009, and references Jeffrey Epstein in the subject line.

persons.name: Robert C. Josefsberg
persons.context: Recipient of an out-of-office auto-reply email from a USAFLS sender. The email's subject references Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named in the subject line of an out-of-office auto-reply email sent from a USAFLS address to attorney Robert C. Josefsberg in late December 2008.

connections.description: Email correspondence from a legal services office (USAFLS) to Josefsberg has Epstein's name in the subject, suggesting a legal or professional connection regarding Epstein.

keyFacts: An out-of-office auto-reply email was sent from a USAFLS (U.S. Air Force Legal Services) address to attorney Robert C. Josefsberg on December 29, 2008.
The subject line of the email references Jeffrey Epstein, indicating Epstein was a topic of correspondence between the sender and Josefsberg.
The timing (late 2008) coincides with the period following Epstein's 2008 plea deal and incarceration.
